  • Class
    Description
    CryptoKeySupport
    Supports generating and reading crypto keys.
    CryptoString
    Converts byte array to crypto string and back in the same fashion as it is done by the Adobe Granite Crypto implementation.
    CryptoSupport
    Support for symmetric encryption and decryption of data.
